span.span: Provides utility methods for common virtual path operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供用于涉及虚拟路径的常见操作的实用工具方法。The class provides utility methods for common operations involving virtual paths. 对于 ASP.NET 服务器控件和服务器代码，使用 Web 应用程序根运算符的虚拟路径，通常使用波形符（~），而不是相对路径和绝对路径。For ASP.NET server controls and server code, virtual paths using the Web application root operator, the tilde (~), commonly are used instead of relative and absolute paths. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 项目路径](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178116(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Project Paths](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ms178116(v=vs.100)). 当需要将应用程序相对路径转换为绝对虚拟路径时，请使用 类，这可能是开发自定义 Web 服务处理程序的情况。Use the class when you need to convert application-relative paths to absolute virtual paths, as might be the case in developing a custom Web service handler. 绝对虚拟路径以文本斜杠（/）开头。An absolute virtual path starts with the literal slash mark (/). 相对虚拟路径是相对于应用程序根目录的相对路径，如果它只是一个波形符（\~）或以颚化符和双反斜杠（\~\\\\）或颚化符和斜杠标记（\~/）开头。A relative virtual path is relative to the application root directory, if it is just a tilde (\~) or starts with the tilde and a double backslash (\~\\\\) or the tilde and a slash mark (\~/). 使虚拟路径相对，使路径与应用程序无关。Making a virtual path relative makes the path independent of the application. 可以从 "" 和 "" 属性获取应用程序的虚拟目录。The virtual directory for the application can be obtained from the and properties. > [!NOTE] > 类不用于安全或规范化目的。The class is not intended for security or canonicalization purposes. 有关 Web 应用程序安全的详细信息，请参阅[Web 应用程序安全威胁概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/f13d73y6(v=vs.140))。For more information about Web application security, see [Overview of Web Application Security Threats](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/f13d73y6(v=vs.140)). 有关泛型 URL 处理功能，请参阅 。For generic URL processing functionality, see . ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的 重载使用 `applicationPath`，而不是当前应用程序路径。The overload of the method uses `applicationPath` rather than the current application path. 如果 `virtualPath` 未以 `applicationPath`开头，则 方法返回未更改的虚拟路径。If `virtualPath` does not start with `applicationPath`, the method returns the virtual path unchanged.
